Tucson nods.

" understandable, land travel does take more time than flight=
.  It gives me a chance to collect my thoughts.  And as I said earlier, I w=
ill not favor anyone, they all get treated the same way."

He then turns hi=
s attentions to the disappearances of Cheetor, Cyclonus, Rodimus, and now O=
ptimus Primal.  He then thinks for a moment about Rodimus, lightly tapping =
a claw in deep thought.

" I remember the last location Cheetor was in, and=
 I logged it in the system computer.   I also logged the last location Rodi=
mus and Cyclonus were last known to be.  Now I need to know where Optimus P=
rimal was last seen and his last coordinates.  I want to see if these event=
s have a geological pattern that somehow leads to the center of activity.  =
We trace lines over the other locations and in the middle of that, is the e=
xact location of our adversary.  Now we Also throw in the direction of the =
dinosaurs last path and that too will play a part as to giving us visual cl=
ues as how to solve this mystery and deal with it appropriately.  Slag I wi=
sh there was a holographic map in here, I could show you what I mean instea=
d of just telling you about it."

He then thinks a bit more.

" Hmmm, going=
 back to Rodimus... Before we had our disagreement, I never did notice a sh=
ift in his IFF that would warrant a reversion back to Predacon status..  Co=
me to think of it, I never got a positive ID on it.  That means either some=
 other alien force has taken him or.... Perhaps constructed an evil clone a=
nd programmed him to act just like Rodimus himself.   Why didn't I notice t=
his before?  Leo, the real Rodimus might be out there along with everyone e=
lse, inluding Optimus Primal.   That's it!  That's why they want Elita!  Sh=
e's the daughter of a Prime!  DNA EXTRACTION!  THE ABILITY TO MAKE COPIES O=
F OURSELVES EQUAL IN STRENGTH AND INTELLIGENCE!  "

He looks to Leo Prime i=
n grave concern.

" Leo, I don't think we have much time, things could now =
go from bad to worse  and it could happen sooner than later.   Hydras shoul=
d also be informed, this could effect all of us."

Perpetually on the move =
and constantly busy. 

On Aug 23, 2011, at 4:22 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercy=
clonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Tucson stops before leaving.
> =
>
> > " On second thought, I should have taken authority right away but I d=
idn't.
> > Leo, if I may, I will speak to all of them. And no, I will not g=
ive any
> > exceptions to anyone, not even my sister. I think it's best tha=
t I speak.
> > Although, if you would like, you may be present as well."
> =
>
> > Tucson now gets on the intercom.
> >
> > " Those who have been called=
 to the ready room, report as requested."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> LEO PRIME nodded =
allowing TUSCON to take charge in this matter.
> "Fine." he said as he smil=
ed slightly. He paused for a moment and then
> looked at TUSCON, "I have a =
response from Wheelie. He is in route but
> it will take him some time to r=
eturn."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-39-828119873
